page.title: 11EDUCATION
page.content: At Boarhills Primary School the children participate in a variety of activities and subjects.Every day it is compulsory to do English and Mathematics,however in the afternoons they can decide whether to do art or a particular project which includes studying a country and its people. Occasionally they participate in a nature or history lesson.In their free time they play an active game of football or in the case of the girls, hockey or skipping.The school is now open until 4.30 p.m. for local children to continue with their sport as Boarhills has no recreational facilities of its own.The children are able to go swimming in St.Andrews once a week and do gymnastics with an outside instructor.
